title: Promo Series restarted
body: Hi to anyone and everyone who is reading this earlier today i got the message that i had started a promotion series then i lost my first game of the series came back to win one straight after the loss but it just restarted the series entirely again is this a common issue atm? will it fix itself over time with server syncs etc.

replies.body: kinda the same problem here. just ended my promos for gold, won 3 of 5 and they just restarted. i need to play again all my promos. is this normal? my win ratio is more than 50% too
